Topic.Title: How do you ask, tell, or order a character something?

Posts.EditableText: I'm trying to test out the Ask/Tell feature to see if it works, but I can't test it because I don't know how to even commit to the action. Can anyone help by telling me the command or such that the player would use to ask, tell, or order?
Posts.HTML: I'm trying to test out the Ask/Tell feature to see if it works, but I can't test it because I don't know how to even commit to the action. Can anyone help by telling me the command or such that the player would use to ask, tell, or order?

Posts.EditableText:
The patterns seem to be:
```
ask #object# about #text#
tell #object# about #text#
```

So, for example, the player could type: "Ask Dave about fishing" or "tell guard about football"

If you ask or tell  the same person a second question or statement  you don’t need the name, you can use “ ask him about whatever” ( or her or it)
 Handy if his name is Zipperowskiconson
